name: BACK TO THE NACHOS
description:
An alien scientist has finally completed his creation: the vending time machine!

Thanks to his creation he will be able to travel back in time and finally conquer the ancient civilization that created the most delicious food in the universe: n a c h o s .

Unfortunately the time travel doesn't work as expected: The scientist gets teleported next to a huge black hole! With just a bunch of minutes to find his way out of this mess, he must unlock all the computer terminals in order to fix the time machine and go back to future!

**DISCLAIMER**

This is a just small preview, since we couldn't finish a game demo.

We hope you will enjoy our visuals!

Credits:
